TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextPointer extends System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition

summary.span: 表示 或 中的一个位置。

span.span: Represents a position within a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引入了以下术语：The class introduces the following terminology: - 位置-本质上，始终指向*位置*内容中。Position - Inherently, a always points to a *position* in content. 可以在流之间或在内容中，字符之间内容元素标记，这类位置定义的内容的结构。Such positions either fall between characters in the content, or between flow content element tags that define structure for the content. - 当前位置-因为始终指示一个位置，因为可以通过执行的操作的许多相对于当前指向的位置是，最好仅仅是指指示位置作为*当前位置*。Current Position - Because a always indicates a position, and because many of the operations that can be performed through a are relative to the position currently pointed to by the , it makes sense to simply refer to the position indicated by a as the *current position*. - 插入位置-*插入位置*是可在其中添加新内容而不会中断任何语义规则关联的内容的位置。Insertion Position - An *insertion position* is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实践中，插入位置位于任何位置内容可能会放置一个插入符号的位置。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 有效的示例不是一个插入位置的位置是相邻的两个位置标记 (即上, 一段的结束标记和下一段的开始标记之间)。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph). - 符号-出于涉及符号的操作，以下任何被视为可*符号*:Symbol - For the purposes of operations that involve symbols, any of the following is considered to be a *symbol*: - 开始或结束标记元素。An opening or closing tag for a element. - 一个元素中包含或。A element contained within an or . 请注意，此类始终算做一个符号; 任何其他内容或包含的元素不计为符号。Note that such a is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the are not counted as symbols. - 每个 16 位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)]内部文本字符元素。Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text element. - 文本容器-一个*文本容器*窗体手头的流内容的最终边框的元素; 所指示的位置始终处于内的文本容器。Text Container - A *text container* is the element that forms the ultimate border for the flow content at hand; the position indicated by a always falls within a text container. 目前，文本容器必须是或。Currently, a text container must be either a or a . 一般来讲，操作之间不支持在不同的文本容器中的实例。Generally speaking, operations between instances in different text containers are not supported. - 文档的文本容器中的内容被称为*文档*，如下所示：方法并和属性。Document - The content in a text container is referred to as a *document*, as in the method and the and properties. 类旨在促进遍历和操作的内容，为由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]流内容元素; 一般情况下，此类元素派生自。The class is intended to facilitate traversal and manipulation of content that is represented by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] flow content elements; in general, such elements derive from . 某些操作的方便了包括以下：Some of the operations that facilitates include the following: - 执行序号比较的第二个指定位置与当前位置。Perform an ordinal comparison of the current position with a second specified position. 请参阅方法。See the method. - 确定指定的方向中的当前位置到相邻的内容类型。Determine the type of content adjacent to the current position in a specified direction. 请参阅方法和枚举。See the method and enumeration. - 获取涵盖当前位置或当前的位置相邻。Get the that scopes or is adjacent to the current position. 请参阅和方法。See and the method. - 获取当前文档的范围限定文本容器。Get the text container that scopes the current document. 请参阅 属性。See the property. - 获取指定的数目的字符之前或之后的当前位置。Get a specified number of characters preceding or following the current position. 请参阅方法。See the method. - 在当前位置插入一个字符的字符串。Insert a string of characters at the current position. 请参阅方法。See the method. - 在内容中查找行边界。Find line boundaries in content. 请参阅方法和属性。See the method and property. - 之间进行转换的位置和符号偏移量转换为内容。Translate between positions and symbol offsets into content. 请参阅和方法。See the and methods. - 执行之间进行转换来的可视化命中测试位置和一个表示相对坐标。Perform visual hit testing by translating between a position and a representing relative coordinates. - 查找附近的插入位置，或检查当前的位置是否是一个插入位置。Find a nearby insertion position, or check whether the current position is an insertion position. 请参阅并方法和属性。See the and methods and the property. 位置和为由对象是固定不变。The position and indicated by a object are immutable. 编辑或修改所指示的位置的内容时不会更改相对于周围文本; 而是相应地调整内容从一开始该位置的偏移量以反映在新的相对位置内容。When content is edited or modified, the position indicated by a does not change relative to the surrounding text; rather the offset of that position from the beginning of content is adjusted correspondingly to reflect the new relative position in content. 例如， ，该值指示给定的段的开始处的位置继续指向该段落开头，即使内容是插入或删除段落之前或之后。For example, a that indicates a position at the beginning of a given paragraph continues to point to the beginning of that paragraph even when content is inserted or deleted before or after the paragraph. 类不提供任何公共构造函数。The class does not provide any public constructors. 实例创建使用其他对象的属性或方法 (包括其他对象)。An instance of is created by using properties or methods of other objects (including other objects). 以下列表提供了几个示例的方法和属性，创建并返回。The following list provides a few examples of methods and properties that create and return a . 此列表并不详尽:This list is not exhaustive: - 从:和。From a : and . - 从: ， ， ，和。From a : , , , and . - 从（文本容器）： ， ，和。From a (text container): , , and . - 从（文本容器）： ，和 From a (text container): , and - 从现有: ， ， ，和。From an existing : , , , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用若要找到只需在第一个位置指定的文本容器中的元素。The following example demonstrates how to use a to find a position just inside of the first element in a specified text container. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_textpointer1)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_textpointer1)] 下面的示例实现非常简单的查找算法使用设施。The following example implements a simplistic find algorithm using facilities. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_textpointer2)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_textpointer2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 CompareTo(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer position) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (position As TextPointer) As Integer

param.name: position
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要与当前位置进行比较的位置。

span.span: A that specifies a position to compare to the current position.

summary.span: 对当前 和第二个指定 所表示位置的顺序进行比较。

span.span: Performs an ordinal comparison between the positions specified by the current and a second specified .

returns.span: 如果当前 位于 之前，则为 -1；如果位置相同，则为 0；如果当前 位于 之后，则为 +1。

span.span: -1 if the current precedes ; 0 if the locations are the same; +1 if the current follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为-1 指示位置指定由当前指定的位置之前`position`。A value of -1 indicates that the position specified by the current precedes the position specified by `position`. 值为 0 指示所指示的位置相等。A value of 0 indicates that the indicated positions are equal. 值 + 1 指示位置指定由当前遵循指定的位置`position`。A value of positive +1 indicates that the position specified by the current follows the position specified by `position`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的用途。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 在示例中，结合使用方法方法来测试是否指定为空。In the example, the method is used in conjunction with the method to test whether a specified is empty. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)]

exception.span: 指定位于与当前位置相关联的文本容器之外的某个位置。

span.span: specifies a position outside of the text container associated with the current position.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 DeleteTextInRun(int32 count) cil managed
Public Function DeleteTextInRun (count As Integer) As Integer

param.name: count
param.span: 从当前位置开始要删除的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters to delete, starting at the current position.

param.span: 指定正值将删除当前位置之后的字符；指定负值将删除当前位置之前的字符。

span.span: Specify a positive value to delete characters that follow the current position; specify a negative value to delete characters that precede the current position.

summary.span: 从当前 指示的位置开始删除指定数目的字符。

span.span: Deletes the specified number of characters from the position indicated by the current .

returns.span: 实际删除的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters actually deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定正值将删除当前位置之后的字符 (如); 指定负值将删除当前位置之前的字符 (如)。Specify a positive value to delete characters that follow the current position (as in ); specify a negative value to delete characters that precede the current position (as in ). 实际删除的字符数可能小于指定的数量`count`。The number of characters actually deleted may be less than the number specified by `count`. 在情况下将发生这种情况其中`count`指定超过存在要删除的字符。This happens in cases where `count` specifies more characters than exist to be deleted.

exception.span: 在不允许出现文本的位置处调用此方法。

span.span: The method is called at a position where text is not allowed.

span.span: Gets a at the beginning of content in the text container associated with the current position.

value.span: 一个 ，它指向文本容器中与当前位置相关联的内容的开始位置。

span.span: A at the beginning of content in the text container associated with the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性返回作为基准位置，从要使用其他位置的相对偏移量的位置。Use the position returned by this property as a baseline position from which to work with relative offsets to other positions. 和方法提供了一种方法的位置和位置之间进行转换偏移量。The and methods provide a way to translate between positions and position offsets. 为其已返回始终是文本容器 (或)，而非。The for the returned is always a text container ( or ), rather than a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.DependencyObject GetAdjacentElement(valuetype System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function GetAdjacentElement (direction As LogicalDirection) As DependencyObject

param.name: direction
param.span: 值之一，它指定搜索相邻元素时的逻辑方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the logical direction in which to search for an adjacent element.

summary.span: 返回在指定逻辑方向上的边界正好位于当前 处的元素（如果有）。

span.span: Returns the element, if any, that borders the current in the specified logical direction.

returns.span: 指定 上的相邻元素；或者，如果不存在任何相邻元素，则为 。

span.span: The adjacent element in the specified , or if no adjacent element exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的元素通常是。The returned element is typically a . 一个时，会返回指示的位置位于元素或元素。A can be returned when the indicates a position inside a element or an element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Rect GetCharacterRect(valuetype System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function GetCharacterRect (direction As LogicalDirection) As Rect

param.name: direction
param.span: 值之一，它指定查找内容边框时的逻辑方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the logical direction in which to find a content bounding box.

summary.span: 返回在指定逻辑方向上的边界正好位于当前 处的内容的边框 ()。

span.span: Returns a bounding box () for content that borders the current in the specified logical direction.

returns.span: 在指定方向上的边界正好位于当前 处的内容的边框；或者，如果当前没有可用的有效布局信息，则为 。

span.span: A bounding box for content that borders the current in the specified direction, or if current, valid layout information is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 边缘不考虑此方法用于内容。 edges are not considered content for the purposes of this method. 如果之前定位边缘，则返回值是边界框的下一个非-指定方向中的内容。If the is positioned before a edge, the return value is a bounding box for the next non- content in the specified direction. 如果指定方向，宽度为零中没有任何内容返回高度匹配的内容的任何前面的高度。If there is no content in the specified direction, a zero-width is returned with a height matching the height of any preceding content. 此方法执行的操作取决于有效的布局。The operation performed by this method depends on a valid layout. 如有必要，此方法将尝试自动重新生成一个有效的布局，然后再继续操作。When necessary, this method attempts to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可以是一个相对高昂的操作。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 使用属性来执行可能会重新生成布局的操作之前检查是否存在有效的布局。Use the property to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer GetInsertionPosition(valuetype System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function GetInsertionPosition (direction As LogicalDirection) As TextPointer

param.name: direction
param.span: 值之一，它指定搜索最近插入位置时的逻辑方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the logical direction in which to search for the closest insertion position.

summary.span: 返回一个指向指定逻辑方向上的最近插入位置的 。

span.span: Returns a to the closest insertion position in the specified logical direction.

returns.span: 一个指向指定方向上的最近插入位置的 。

span.span: A to the closest insertion position in the specified direction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入位置是可在其中添加新内容而不会中断任何语义规则关联的内容的位置。An insertion position is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实践中，插入位置位于任何位置内容可能会放置一个插入符号的位置。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 有效的示例不是一个插入位置的位置是相邻的两个位置标记 (即上, 一段的结束标记和下一段的开始标记之间)。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph). 如果已指向一个有效的插入位置，但结束标记为非空的格式设置序列紧接在给定的方向，该位置则返回此方法将调整为指向插入恰好在格式设置序列的关闭后的位置。If the already points to a valid insertion position, but the closing tag for a non-empty formatting sequence directly follows that position in the given direction, then the returned by this method is adjusted to point to the insertion position just after the close of the formatting sequence. 例如，考虑标记序列`ab`。For example, consider the markup sequence `ab`. 请注意，有两个字母之间的插入位置`a`并`b`-其中一个位于右`Bold`标记和另一个紧随结束`Bold`标记。Note that there are two insertion positions between the letters `a` and `b` - one that precedes the closing `Bold` tag, and one directly following the closing `Bold` tag. 如果上调用字母之后紧邻的位置`a`之前的右`Bold`标记，并使用`direction`的，返回调整为指向位置的字母前就`b`，关闭之后`Bold`标记。If is called on a to the position directly after the letter `a` and before of the closing `Bold` tag, and with a `direction` of , the returned is adjusted to point to the position just before the letter `b`, after the closing `Bold` tag. 用于打开格式设置标记，在相反的逻辑方向中工作时进行类似的调整。A similar adjustment is made for opening formatting tags when working in the opposite logical direction. 此方法旨在提供一种在类似情况下的插入位置之间的歧义消除。This method is intended to provide a means of disambiguation between insertion positions in similar cases. 此外可以使用此方法涉及一系列结构标记时要谨慎的插入点。This method can also be used to be selective about insertion points when a sequence of structural tags is involved. 例如，在关闭和打开段落标记之间的某个位置，该定向参数可用于选择以下段落开头最近的插入点 (通过指定) 或上一段落 （结尾处通过指定)。For example, when at a position between closing and opening paragraph tags, the direction parameter can be used to select the closest insertion point at the beginning of the following paragraph (by specifying ) or at the end of the preceding paragraph (by specifying ). 如果指针已在插入位置，而没有相邻的格式设置标记中指定`direction`，返回指向与调用的相同位置。If the pointer is already at insertion position, and there are no adjacent formatting tags in the specified `direction`, the returned points to the same position as the calling . 可以相对于指向的位置是否存在任何有效的插入位置。It is possible that no valid insertion position exists relative to the position pointed to by a . 如果引用的内容不完整结构，如下所示的空表或列表可以发生这种情况。This can happen if the referenced content is structurally incomplete, as in an empty table or list. 在这种情况下，此方法只需返回到同一位置从中调用此方法。In such cases, this method simply returns a to the same position as the from which this method was called. 此方法始终返回有效。This method always returns a valid . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用方法来检查是否指定的可打印的内容为空。This example shows how to use the method to check whether a specified is empty of printable content. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)]

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它指向相对于当前 指定的行的开始位置。

span.span: Returns a to the beginning of a line that is specified relative to the current .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer GetLineStartPosition(int32 count) cil managed
Public Function GetLineStartPosition (count As Integer) As TextPointer

param.name: count
param.span: 在确定要返回其开始位置的行时要跳过的行开始位置标记数。

span.span: The number of start-of-line markers to skip when determining the line for which to return the starting position.

param.span: 负值指定前面的行，0 指定当前行，正值指定后面的行。

span.span: Negative values specify preceding lines, 0 specifies the current line, and positive values specify following lines.

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它指向相对于当前 指定的行的开始位置。

span.span: Returns a to the beginning of a line that is specified relative to the current .

returns.span: 一个指向指定行的开始位置的 （ 设置为 ）；或者，如果指定行超出范围或无法定位，则为 。

span.span: A pointing to the beginning of the specified line (with the set to ), or if the specified line is out of range or otherwise cannot be located.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指向不明确的位置，例如，两行之间的行中指定的方向被选为相对的起始行。If the points to an ambiguous position, for example, between two lines, the line in the direction specified by is selected as the relative starting line. 此方法执行的操作取决于有效的布局。The operation performed by this method depends on a valid layout. 如有必要，此方法将尝试自动重新生成一个有效的布局，然后再继续操作。When necessary, this method attempts to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可以是一个相对高昂的操作。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 使用来执行可能会重新生成布局的操作之前检查是否存在有效的布局。Use to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer GetLineStartPosition (int count, out int actualCount);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer GetLineStartPosition(int32 count, [out] int32& actualCount) cil managed
Public Function GetLineStartPosition (count As Integer, ByRef actualCount As Integer) As TextPointer
public: System::Windows::Documents::TextPointer ^ GetLineStartPosition(int count, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % actualCount);

param.name: count
param.span: 在确定要返回其开始位置的行时要跳过的行开始位置标记数。

span.span: The number of start-of-line markers to skip when determining the line for which to return the starting position.

param.span: 负值指定前面的行，0 指定当前行，正值指定后面的行。

span.span: Negative values specify preceding lines, 0 specifies the current line, and positive values specify following lines.

param.name: actualCount
param.span: 此方法返回时，将包含在确定要返回其开始位置的行时所实际跳过的行开始位置标记数。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the actual number of start-of-line markers that were skipped when determining the line for which to return the starting position.

param.span: 如果在跳过指定行数之前遇到内容的开始或结束位置，则此值可能小于 。

span.span: This value may be less than if the beginning or end of content is encountered before the specified number of lines are skipped.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 返回一个指向相对于当前 所指定行的开始位置的 ，并报告跳过的行数。

span.span: Returns a to the beginning of a line that is specified relative to the current , and reports how many lines were skipped.

returns.span: 一个指向指定行的开始位置的 （ 设置为 ）；或者，如果指定行超出范围，则指向最靠近指定行的行的开始位置。

span.span: A pointing to the beginning of the specified line (with the set to ), or to the beginning of the line closest to the specified line if the specified line is out of range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指向不明确的位置，例如，两行之间的行中指定的方向属性选择作为相对的起始行。If the points to an ambiguous position, for example, between two lines, the line in the direction specified by the property is selected as the relative starting line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下任何被视为一个符号：Any of the following is considered to be a symbol: - 开始或结束标记元素。An opening or closing tag for a element. - 一个元素中包含或。A element contained in an or . 请注意，此类始终算做一个符号; 任何其他内容或包含的元素不计为符号。Note that such a is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the are not counted as symbols. - 16 位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)]内部文本字符元素。A 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text element. 如果下一个符号是否属于， ，或(由鉴定方法)，则返回此方法从当前位置前移由恰好一个符号。If the next symbol is categorized as , , or (as identified by the method), then the returned by this method is advanced by exactly one symbol from the current position. 如果下一个符号是否属于，则返回此方法过去的文本前移至下一个非文本符号 (即的下一个位置不是)。If the next symbol is categorized as , then the returned by this method is advanced past the text to the next non-text symbol (that is, the next position where the is not ). 可以通过调用预先计算的确切符号数超过方法。The exact symbol count crossed can be calculated in advance by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的用途。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 该示例使用方法结合方法以遍历和提取中指定的符号。The example uses the method in conjunction with the method to traverse and extract the symbols in a specified . 虽然可以使用该示例中提取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]内容的结构给定，它旨在仅，用于说明目的，不应在生产代码中使用。While the example can be used to extract a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] structure for the contents of a given , it is intended for illustrative purposes only, and should not be used in production code. 请参阅一套丰富的设计用于处理和处理 XML 类型的命名空间。See the namespace for a rich set of types designed for working with and processing XML. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetNextContextPosition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_getnextcontextposition)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetNextContextPosition](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_getnextcontextposition)]

Public Function GetNextInsertionPosition (direction As LogicalDirection) As TextPointer

param.name: direction
param.span: 值之一，它指定搜索下一个插入位置时的逻辑方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the logical direction in which to search for the next insertion position.

summary.span: 返回一个指向指定逻辑方向上的下一个插入位置的 。

span.span: Returns a to the next insertion position in the specified logical direction.

returns.span: 一个 ，它标识所请求方向上的下一个插入位置；或者，如果找不到下一个插入位置，则为 。

span.span: A that identifies the next insertion position in the requested direction, or if no next insertion position can be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *插入位置*是可在其中添加新内容而不会中断任何语义规则关联的内容的位置。An *insertion position* is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实践中，插入位置位于任何位置内容可能会放置一个插入符号的位置。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 有效的示例不是一个插入位置的位置是相邻的两个位置标记 (即上, 一段的结束标记和下一段的开始标记之间)。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph). ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的用途。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 该示例使用方法来遍历为了数目进行计数的内容元素边界元素呈现指定两个实例。The example uses the method to traverse content element boundaries in order to count the number of elements present between two specified instances. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetNextInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_getnextinsertionposition)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetNextInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_getnextinsertionposition)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下任何被视为一个符号：Any of the following is considered to be a symbol: - 开始或结束标记元素。An opening or closing tag for a element. - 一个元素中包含或。A element contained in an or . 请注意，此类始终算做一个符号; 任何其他内容或包含的元素不计为符号。Note that such a is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the are not counted as symbols. - 16 位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)]内部文本字符元素。A 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的用途。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 该示例使用方法来查找两个偏移量实例，，然后使用此信息来保存和还原中的选定内容。The example uses the method to find the offsets for two instances, and then uses this information to save and restore the selection in a . 该示例假定的内容已保存的选项并选择还原之间未发生更改。The example assumes that the contents of the have not changed between a selection save and a selection restore. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅返回不中断的文本。This method returns only uninterrupted runs of text. 如果任何符号类型而不执行任何操作，则返回相邻当前中指定的方向。Nothing is returned if any symbol type other than is adjacent to the current in the specified direction. 同样，最多的下一个非文本符号只返回文本。Similarly, text is returned only up to the next non-text symbol. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的用途。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 该示例使用方法以实现简单的文本提取程序。The example uses the method to implement a simple text extractor. 该方法返回的所有文本字符串串联两个指定之间实例。The method returns a string concatenation of all text between two specified instances. 虽然可以使用该示例中提取两个之间的任何文本实例，它旨在仅，用于说明目的，不应在生产代码中使用。While the example can be used to extract any text between two instances, it is intended for illustrative purposes only, and should not be used in production code. 改用 属性。Use the property instead. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前位置相关联的文本容器是否具有有效（最新）的布局。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the text container associated with the current position has a valid (up-to-date) layout.

value.span: 如果布局是最新的而且有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the layout is current and valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如有必要，依赖于有效的布局的操作 (如方法，方法，和属性) 尝试自动重新生成一个有效的布局，然后再继续操作。When necessary, operations that depend on a valid layout (such as the method, method, and property) attempt to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可以是一个相对高昂的操作。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 此属性用于在执行可能会重新生成布局的操作之前检查存在有效的布局。Use this property to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer InsertParagraphBreak() cil managed

summary.span: 在当前位置插入一个分段符。

span.span: Inserts a paragraph break at the current position.

returns.span: 一个指向新段落开始位置 () 的 。

span.span: A to the beginning () of the new paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前的位置的现有内部时调用此方法元素、 现有段落和它包含任何内容将被拆分为两个位于当前位置的段落。If this method is called when the current position is inside of an existing element, the existing paragraph and any content it contains are split into two paragraphs at the current position. 如果当前位置不在现有段落时调用此方法，将插入一个新的空段落。If this method is called when the current position is not inside of an existing paragraph, a new, empty paragraph is inserted. 如果调用此方法的位置拆分或将其插入段落不适合 (例如，如果当前的位置内的元素)，将引发异常。If this method is called at a position unsuitable for splitting or inserting a paragraph (for example, if the current position is inside of a element), an exception is thrown.

exception.span: 应针对无法进行拆分以容纳一个新段落的位置调用此方法，例如在 或 的范围内。

span.span: This method is called on a position that cannot be split to accommodate a new paragraph, such as in the scope of a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不通过局限元素，连同插入`textData`。If the is not scoped by a element, a is inserted along with the `textData`.

exception.span: 当前位置没有位于 元素内。

span.span: The current position is not within a element.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAtInsertionPosition As Boolean
public: property bool IsAtInsertionPosition { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前位置是否是一个插入位置。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current position is an insertion position.

value.span: 如果当前位置是插入位置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current position is an insertion position; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入位置是可在其中添加新内容而不会中断任何语义规则关联的内容的位置。An insertion position is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实践中，插入位置位于任何位置内容可能会放置一个插入符号的位置。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 有效的示例不是一个插入位置的位置是相邻的两个位置标记 (即上, 一段的结束标记和下一段的开始标记之间)。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAtLineStartPosition As Boolean
public: property bool IsAtLineStartPosition { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前位置是否位于行的开始处。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current position is at the beginning of a line.

value.span: 如果当前位置位于行的开始处，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current position is at the beginning of a line; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指向不明确的位置，例如，两行之间的行中指定的方向属性选择作为相对的起始行。If the points to an ambiguous position, for example, between two lines, the line in the direction specified by the property is selected as the relative starting line. 此属性执行的操作取决于有效的布局。The operation performed by this property depends on a valid layout. 如有必要，此方法将尝试自动重新生成一个有效的布局，然后再继续操作。When necessary, this method attempts to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可以是一个相对高昂的操作。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 使用属性来执行可能会重新生成布局的操作之前检查是否存在有效的布局。Use the property to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsInSameDocument(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer textPosition) cil managed
Public Function IsInSameDocument (textPosition As TextPointer) As Boolean

param.name: textPosition
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要与当前位置进行比较的位置。

span.span: A that specifies a position to compare to the current position.

summary.span: 指示指定位置与当前位置是否位于相同的文本容器内。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified position is in the same text container as the current position.

returns.span: 如果 指示的位置与当前位置位于相同的文本容器内，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if indicates a position that is in the same text container as the current position; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数操作涉及多个实例才有效，如果有问题的实例指示的相同的文本容器作用域中的位置。Most operations that involve multiple instances are only valid if the instances in question indicate positions that are in the same text container scope. 例如并方法不能用于到与当前位置相关联的文本容器之外的位置。For example the and methods cannot be used with a to a position outside of the text container associated with the current position. 使用此方法来验证指定适用于此类操作的当前位置。Use this method to verify that a specified is compatible with the current position for such operations. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的用途。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 该示例使用方法来检查是否指定位于之间其他两个指定中时，所有三个位置都属于相同的文本容器不能保证的情况下的实例。The example uses the method to check whether a specified is positioned between two other specified instances in a situation when there is no guarantee that all three positions belong to the same text container. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_IsInSameDocument](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_isinsamedocument)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_IsInSameDocument](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_isinsamedocument)]

span.span: is .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取与当前位置相关联的逻辑方向，用于消除与当前位置相关联内容的不确定性。

span.span: Gets the logical direction associated with the current position which is used to disambiguate content associated with the current position.

value.span: 与当前位置相关联的 值。

span.span: The value that is associated with the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了举例说明如何使用此属性，的返回命中测试方法提供两个字符的文本之间的命中。As an example of how this property is used, the of the returned by a hit test method gives a hit that is between two characters of text. 逻辑方向指定实际影响这两个字符的左侧或右侧。The logical direction specifies which of the two characters was actually hit - the left or the right.
